title: Cannot Log In
body: When I open the League client and I type my password, it takes about 20-30 seconds and comes back and says there was an error, I have the Hextech Repair Tool. But nothing has worked. I was able to get in but when I tried to start a match, it said there was an error and the only button I could click said "Exit". Please Help.

replies.body: Just coming to reiterate, but yeah I'm seeing quite a lot of reports coming in.  It looks like players in the West/SW are currently having login issues.  Not sure what the cause is exactly, but it's being looked into.  Sorry for the trouble!
thank god I've been trying to log in for the past 1hr and a half but good thing its being worked on will we get an update

Actually it says that i cant make a lobby/ friend invites me and i cant join (friend cant start queue)
eune/euw
for me I get stuck at "Authenticating..."

Same here. Be Advised: 

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7qjAF9Z6,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-12-09T22:24:30.385+0000)
>
> Hey guys!  I dug into this and it looks like there are login issues impacting players in the Southwest (USA).   You may experience issues logging in or getting stuck at the authentication server.  Players who are already logged in should be able to play without issue.  I don't have anymore info right now, but I'll do my best to offer updates as I find them.  Hang tight!
